channel.title: Experiences on Bmytrip - content
channel.description: Recent content in Experiences on Bmytrip - content

item.title: EXPPNT1901PR
item.description: HIGHTLIGHTS: Torres del Paine National Park, Ferrier Mount, Grey Glacier Viewpoint, Grey Glacier You will get closer to the first chapter of our Trip to Torres del Paine National Park. This first approach will give you the possibility to get to know one of the most impressive panoramic views of the Torres del Paine National Park, learn more about the local gastronomy & cocktails and finally, get close to our first Patagonian Glacier.

item.title: EXPPNT1903SH
item.description: HIGHTLIGHTS: Estancia visit & shows of sheep dogs / Trekking or Horseback Riding in Estancia La Peninsula only for BMYTRIP Travellers You will learn about the daily life of a Patagonian Estancia (Ranch) and the beauty of the fjords and glaciers of Chilean Patagonia aboard a small and modern vessel. TRIP DETAILS TIME SERVICE Full Day Tour NUMBER OF TRAVELLERS 1 to 16 travellers

item.title: EXPPNT1904SH
item.description: HIGHTLIGHTS: Cerro Paine area, Ascencio valley, El Chileno refugee, Base Torres You will demonstrate your stamina on our Shared active experience, one of the most required by our travellers who also are Nature Lovers. You will know through this experience one of the most beautiful areas of the Torres del Paine National Park. TRIP DETAILS TIME SERVICE Full Day Tour NUMBER OF TRAVELLERS 1 to 8 travellers

item.title: EXPPNT1905PR
item.description: HIGHTLIGHTS: Grey Lake / Grey Glacier Viewpoint / Pehoe Lake Area / Salto Grande fall / Lake Noerdenskjold viewpoint / Cascada Paine. Flora & Fauna (possibility to glimpse Caranchos cara-cara / Guanacos and chulengos / patagonian hares / Grey fox or "Chilla") You will experience one of our most required SHARED Experice by our travelers who want to know Torres del Paine National Park in a relaxed and low-demanding environment.

item.title: EXPPNT1905SH
item.description: HIGHTLIGHTS: Grey Lake / Grey Glacier Viewpoint / Pehoe Lake Area / Salto Grande fall / Lake Noerdenskjold viewpoint / Cascada Paine. Flora & Fauna (possibility to glimpse Caranchos cara-cara / Guanacos and chulengos / patagonian hares / Grey fox or "Chilla") You will experience one of our most required SHARED Experice by our travelers who want to know Torres del Paine National Park in a relaxed and low-demanding environment.

item.title: EXPPNT1906PR
item.description: HIGHTLIGHTS: Grey Lake / Grey Glacier Viewpoint / Pehoe Lake Area / Salto Grande fall / Lake Noerdenskjold viewpoint / Cascada Paine. Flora & Fauna (possibility to glimpse Caranchos cara-cara / Guanacos and chulengos / patagonian hares / Grey fox or "Chilla") You will experience one of most required PRIVATE Experice by travelers who want to know Torres del Paine Park in a relaxed and low-demanding environment.

item.title: EXPPNT1906SH
item.description: HIGHTLIGHTS: Grey Lake / Grey Glacier Viewpoint / Pehoe Lake Area / Salto Grande fall / Lake Noerdenskjold viewpoint / Cascada Paine. Flora & Fauna (possibility to glimpse Caranchos cara-cara / Guanacos and chulengos / patagonian hares / Grey fox or "Chilla") You will experience one of our most required shared Experice by travelers who want to know Torres del Paine Park in a relaxed and low-demanding environment.

item.title: EXPPNT1907SH
item.description: HIGHTLIGHTS: Balmaceda & Serrano glaciers, Condors waterfall, Estancia Perales (Ranch) You will experience one of our most demanded SHARED Experiences by our travelers who love Patagonia gastronomy (dont´s miss Patagonian BBQ) and who also loves sailing the fjords of the end of the world. We will learn a little about life in a Patagonian Estancia (Eberhard Ranch) and two of the most important glaciers in Chilean Patagonia, in a relaxed and low-demanding environment.

item.title: EXPPNT1908SH
item.description: HIGHTLIGHTS: Perito Moreno Glacier (Los Glaciares National Park entrance fee) You will experience one of the most interesting SHARED Experiences of the Argentine Patagonia. We will cross Chile´s border to get to know the Perito Moreno Glacier, one of the largest and still advancing glaciers in the world. Every so often, the growth of this glacier is such that it generates an event called Breaking, creating one of the most amazing & unique events in the world.

item.title: EXPPUQ1901SH
item.description: HIGHTLIGHTS: Cross Mirador Hill, Tierra del Fuego, Maggiorino Borgatello Museum, Sara Brown Public cemetery , Nao Victoria Ship, Punta Arenas main square Myths Punta Arenas is the capital of the Chilean Patagonia, here you will visit places with history such as Magellan´s Strait discover, Patagonian Colonization in late nineteenth century and modern life in one of the southernmost cities in the world. TRIP DETAILS TIME SERVICE Half Day Tour

item.title: EXPPNT1902PR
item.description: HIGHTLIGHTS: Nordenskjold Viewpoint / Pehoe lake / Salto Grande waterfall / paine flora & fauna (possibility to appreciate guanacos, caranchos, foxes, patagonian rheas & possibly a puma's herd) You will get closer to another of our chapters of our SMALL GROUP Trip in Torres del Paine National Park. In this experience, starting early in the morning, we will visit Torres del Paine National Park. Our main focus will be the great diversity of Patagonian flora and fauna in a relaxed environment.

item.title: EXPPUQ1901PR
item.description: HIGHTLIGHTS: Cross Mirador Hill, Tierra del Fuego, Maggiorino Borgatello Museum, Sara Brown Public cemetery , Nao Victoria Ship, Punta Arenas main square Myths Punta Arenas is the capital of the Chilean Patagonia, here you will visit places with history such as Magellan´s Strait discover, Patagonian Colonization in late nineteenth century and modern life in one of the southernmost cities in the world. TRIP DETAILS TIME SERVICE Half Day Tour
